# Amulet of Natural Armor +2
## Overview
**Aura** faint transmutation; **CL** 5th

**Slot** neck

**Price** 8,000 gp

**Weight** —

**Description**

This amulet, usually crafted from bone or beast scales, toughens the wearer’s body and flesh, giving him an enhancement bonus to his natural armor of +2.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Barkskin (Spell)|barkskin]]*, creator’s caster level must be at least three times the amulet’s bonus

**Cost** 4,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 500
